DOC.brief_title: HCV ( Hepatitis C Virus ) Viral Host Genotyping ( IL28B , Interleukin 28B ) China
DOC.detailed_description: A sample 1000 Han ethnic Chinese male female ≥ 18 year old recent confirmation anti-HCV-antibody positive HCV RNA positive antiviral treatment naive 28 university affiliate hospital China . The primary objective study estimate distribution HCV Viral genotyping ( ie , genotype 1 6 know subtypes ) , host genotype , inosine triphosphatase ( ITPA ) gene , IL28B . This study also collect data include patient ' demographic clinical characteristic . There active antiviral treatment follow-up study .
